MajorClaims.MC1: once you are unique enough, you are already on the way to success
MajorClaims.MC2: being different and unique is the better way to achieve success

Claims.C1: If you don't make yourself outstanding enough or you fail to distinguish yourself from others, you will be easily replaced and eliminated by someone who is better than you
Claims.C2: being unique can create your own value which can never be taken by others
Claims.C3: It not only shows your competence but also creates your own value, making you take the lead in your way towards success

Premises.P1: when I was in college, I was always chosen to be the presenter of group report
Premises.P2: I was the only one in my group who could present the report thoroughly and fluently
Premises.P3: being positively different from everyone else usually means that you've achieved something that is superior than others
Premises.P4: As living in a competent world, we are like playing a survival game
Premises.P5: Only who has the sharpest weapon can survive
Premises.P6: Take the most popular and prestigious technology company- Apple- for example
Premises.P7: The reason why it gains such a tremendous success is because it achieves some brilliant qualities that can never be caught up by other competitors
Premises.P8: It has its operating systems that can run smoother than any other companies and its design always wins the popularity among consumers
Premises.P9: It is the uniqueness of Apple design that creates its own value
Premises.P10: once you are special and unique, pursuing success is a matter of actively creating the fashion rather than passively waiting for other people to recognize and appreciate you
